info.partie1: You can select up to 20 commands at no additional cost. Beyond 20, an additional fee of €1 will be applied for every 3 extra commands.
info.partie2: Custom commands are subject to an additional fee of €2 each. Please note that additional time may be required to process custom commands.
info.partie3: Payment is made via PayPal. An email containing the payment link will be sent to you.

delay: The estimated delivery time for the bot is 3 business days.

error.error_submit: An error occurred while submitting the order. Please try again later.
error.select_commands: Please select at least one command.

success.success_submit: Your order has been successfully submitted. An email containing the payment link will be sent to you shortly.
success.success_command: Your order has been successfully submitted.

terms_agreement: I accept the terms of service
